name: SPIDER FLEET, S.A.P.I. DE C.V.
description: Provider of a fleet management system created to evaluate driving performance and control fuel consumption. The company's system offers total monitoring of operator management behaviors, real-time geolocation of vehicles, intelligent routes and itineraries tracking, and fuel control and maintenance, enabling customers to radically improve the management of commercial and private vehicle fleets.
